title: Astroscale gets funds for 2024 debris-removal mission
summary: Astroscale has secured European Space Agency funding for a 2024 demo mission to remove what will likely be a OneWeb satellite.

title: China targets permanently shadowed regions at lunar south pole
summary: China is looking to land spacecraft near permanently shadowed regions near the south pole of the moon to investigate the potential presence of resources trapped in craters.

title: SpaceX rolls out first new Starship prototype in nine months
summary: For the first time in more than nine months, SpaceX has rolled a new Starship prototype to its Starbase, Texas launch facilities...

title: Rocket Report: Meet the Gravity-1 rocket; will Starship really cut launch costs?
summary: "I probably can’t express in words what it meant for me."

title: NASA to Pick Next Generation Spacesuits for Moonwalking, Spacewalking
summary: NASA will announce at 2 p.m. EDT (1 p.m. CDT) Wednesday, June 1, the company, or companies, selected to move forward in developing the next generation of spacesuits for Artemis missions at the Moon and the International Space Station during an event at the agency’s Johnson Space Center in Houston.
